Constructs a string representation of a hash (a map keyed with strings).

Parameters:
hash The hash to assemble
itemDelim the character to insert between the key and the value
pairStartDelim the character to insert before a pair starts
pairEndDelim the character to insert after the pair ends

template<class T>
T Utility::assembleVector (  const vector< T > &  vec,
string  delim = ",",
bool  doDelim = true
)  [inline]
 

Handy util function for re-assembling the elements of the vector.

Note that it only works if the += makes sense on the T type (like turning a vector of strings into one big string)

Parameters:
vec the vector to assemble
delim a delimiter to insert between vector elements
doDelim whether or not to add delimiters between the vector elements
